DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal study examine efficacy combination mirtazapine sertraline treatment posttraumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) . Sertraline FDA-approved PTSD , often fully effective . The combination mirtazapine serotonin reuptake inhibitor like sertraline appear highly effective related disorder -- depression . In study , sixty patient chronic PTSD randomize treatment either sertraline + mirtazapine sertraline + placebo 12 week . Patients show least minimal response 12 week continue another 12 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Combined Mirtazapine SSRI Treatment PTSD : A Placebo-Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind randomized control trial conduct January 2011 February 2014 . To acquire diverse sample , outpatient recruit academic medical center private mental health clinic primarily Spanish-speaking patient . A single team investigator conduct trial setting . Individuals chronic PTSD randomly assign 24 week double-blind treatment sertraline plus mirtazapine sertraline plus placebo . This study conduct compliance Code Ethics World Medical Association ( Declaration Helsinki ) standard establish Institutional Review Board National Institutes Health . Informed consent obtain participant nature procedure explain . Participants Participants adult age 18-75 , refer clinician respond advertisement . After preliminary telephone screening , eligibility determine clinical interview confirm structured interview train raters use Clinician-Administered PTSD Scale ( CAPS ) Structured Clinical Interview DSM-IV Axis I Disorders -- Patient Edition . Participants principal Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , 4th Edition ( DSM-IV ) diagnosis chronic PTSD least moderate severity ( CAPS score â‰¥50 ) , English Spanish fluency . Bilingual clinician treat assessed individual Spanish language preference . Exclusion criterion significant suicidal ideation ; lifetime psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder , organic mental disorder , seizure disorder ; alcohol substance use disorder past 3 month ; unstable medical illness ; history traumatic brain injury great moderate severity ; pregnancy nursing ; unwillingness use contraception ( woman childbearing potential ) ; prior nonresponse sertraline combine treatment , intolerance sertraline mirtazapine ) ; psychotropic medication use prior 2 week ( 4 week monoamine oxidase inhibitor fluoxetine ) , except zolpidem insomnia allow three time per week week prior randomization ; psychotherapy initiate within 3 month randomization .
